ns2:EnumDataTypeDefinition.ns1:desc: The desired association type for this NTP server.

ns2:member.name: peer
ns2:member.ns2:desc: Use symmetric active association mode. This device may provide synchronization to the configured NTP server.

ns2:member.name: pool
ns2:member.ns2:desc: Use client association mode with one or more of the NTP servers found by DNS resolution of the domain name given by the 'address' leaf. This device will not provide synchronization to the servers.

ns2:member.name: server
ns2:member.ns2:desc: Use client association mode. This device will not provide synchronization to the configured NTP server.
